thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Donald

author: Donald
title: Donald
text:
The flight information was plentiful. The prices were reasonable, and I readily found the departure and return itineraries that suited my needs.
Also, I accidentally chose the insurance package by mistake and phoned in immediately and the agent refunded the insurance portion right away, confirmed the refund transaction by email, and all of this took 10 minutes including the booking portion. Very pleased with the transaction.
